Welcome to My Sight Guide, your personal assistant for seeing the world. You can ask me to describe a scene, read text, or identify objects and currency. You can also ask me any general question, like "what is the news today?". If you ever forget the commands, just say "help". You can say "close app" at any time to exit. Now, what would you like to do first?
To personalize your experience, please tell me your name after the tone.
